EXSLTSetLeading.summary: set:leading() returns the nodes in one node-set that come before the first node in the other node-set.
EXSLTSetLeading.returns:
A node-set containing the nodes from nodeSet1 whose values precede the first node in nodeSet2.
NOTENote: If the first node in nodeSet2 isn't contained in nodeSet1, an empty set is returned. If nodeSet2 is empty, then the result is nodeSet1.
